TO THE READER
A special chapter is assigned to the collapse of the theory of evolution
because this theory constitutes the basis of all anti-spiritual philoso-
phies. Since Darwinism rejects the fact of creation—and therefore,
Allah's existence—over the last 150 years it has caused many people to
abandon their faith or fall into doubt. It is therefore an imperative serv-
ice, a very important duty to show everyone that this theory is a decep-
tion. Since some readers may find the opportunity to read only one of
our books, we think it appropriate to devote a chapter to summarize
this subject.
All the author's books explain faith-related issues in light of Qur'anic
verses, and invite readers ** lear* Allah's words and to live by them.
All the subjects concerning Allah's verses are explained so as to leave
no doubt or room for questions in the reader's mind. The books' sin-
cere, plain, and fluent style ensures that everyone of every age and
from ever* *oc*al group ca**ea*ily *nderstand*them.*Thanks to their
effective, lucid narrative, they can be read at one sitting. Even those
who rigorously reject spirituality are influenced by the facts these
books document and cannot refute the truthfulness of their contents.
This*and all the other books by the author can be read individually, or
discussed in a group. Readers eager to profit from the books will f*nd
discussion very useful, letting them relate their reflections and experi-
ences to one another.
In addition, it will be a great service to Islam to contribute to the publi-
cation and reading of these books, written solely for the pleasure of
Allah. The author's books are all extremely convincing. For this reason,
to communicate true religion to others, *ne of the most effective meth-
ods is encouraging them to read these books.
We hope the reader will look through the reviews of his other books at
the back of this book. His rich source material on faith-related issues is
very useful, and*a pleasure to read.
In these books, unlike some other books, you will not find the author's
per*onal views* explanati*ns based on du*ious sources, style* that are
unobservant of the respect and reverence due to sacred subjects, n*r
hopeless, pessimistic arguments that create doubts in the mind and de-
viations in *he heart.

T hroughout the course of this book, various significant aspects

not belong solely to our own time and society. On the contrary, this

arrogance and self-love may assume di*ferent forms. But at the end
of the day, the fundamental logic is still the same.
This logic, as emphasized right from the outset, is the result of
the Ignorantists having forgotten Allah. As it is stated in the Qur'an,
they " have made Him into something to cast disdainfully be-
hind [their] backs!" (Surah Hud, *2). Members of this false religion
are unaware that they have come into this world in order to serve
Allah, and that His mercy is their only salvation. Yet it is Allah Who
created us, gave us form and appearance in our mothers' wombs,
brought us into the world, prepared that world for us, has mercy
upon us, causes us to*live and will eventually cause us to die. We
166
Harun Yahya - Adnan Oktar
have no other guardian, Lord, or Deity than Him. We came from
Him and shall return to Him. We shall not remain long in this world.

most unwise to engage in petty calculations of interest in this world,
where we shall remain for only a brief time, to show off to one an-
other* to thirst after goods and property that are condemned to van-
ish, and to choose other guides, other aims and other causes than
those in th* religion*of Allah. *he world *as been c*eate* as the

following His path and holding fast to Allah. That is indeed what we

Protector, the Best Helper. (Surat al-Hajj, 78)
Everything examined throughout this book reveals the dis-

Religion of the Ignorant. When its features are compared to the true
